    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomSample

        public RandomSample(Constants.Constant type,
                    int size,
                    java.lang.Integer[] populationValues,
                    boolean replacement)
             throws MException
        Creates a new RandomSample.
        Parameters:
        type - Random sample type
        size - Size
        populationValues - The entire population
        replacement - Whether or not replacement is used during stratification
        Throws:
        MException - Mathematical exception if a configuration cannot be used

      • RandomSample

        public RandomSample(Constants.Constant type,
                    int size,
                    java.lang.Integer[] populationValues,
                    int[] stratumIndex,
                    boolean replacement)
             throws MException
        Creates a new RandomSample, with stratified-sample parameter. Unfinished.
        Parameters:
        type - Random sample type
        size - Size
        populationValues - The entire population
        stratumIndex - The values to set as strata. Order: [strataLevel, numberOfValuesInStrata, strataLevel + 1, numberOfValuesInStrata2].
        replacement - Whether or not replacement is used during stratification
        Throws:
        MException - Mathematical error while calculating random sample
